list.en: I lost my way.
I seem to be lost.
Do you know where you are now?
list.cn: 你知道你现在在哪里吗?

list.en: Don't worry, follow my instruction.
Who can get in touch with them?
I strayed from the team.
What should I do if I lost in the darkness?
list.cn: 如果我在黑暗中迷路了怎么办?

list.en: Where am I?
Where can I get a bus?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以坐公共汽车?

list.en: I'm a bit lost.
How long will it take to get there?
I'm a stranger here.
I think I'm lost.
I feel like throwing up.
His ears are hurting. What should I do?
list.cn: 他的耳朵疼。我该怎么办?

list.en: I'm having trouble breathing.
May I have some medicine for air sickness?
list.cn: 请给我一些晕机药好吗?

list.en: May I have an air sickness bag?
list.cn: 可以给我一个晕机袋吗?

list.en: Why this happens to me when I am on the plane.
list.cn: 为什么当我在飞机上的时候会发生这种事。

list.en: Do you feel any better?
There's an air sickness bag behind the seat that's in front of you.
list.cn: 在你前面的座位后面有一个晕机袋。

list.en: I feel a little uncomfortable.
Some pills might be helpful.
list.cn: 一些药片可能会有帮助。

list.en: Do you have any medicine for air sickness?
I think I am a little bit air sick.
If you are susceptible to air sickness, your best bet is to sit over the Wing.
list.cn: 如果你容易晕机，最好的选择是坐在机翼上方。

list.en: I've got air sickness.
Try to relax.
Why couldn't I find my luggage on the conveyor belt?
list.cn: 为什么我在传送带上找不到我的行李?

list.en: Where is the lost and found?
What has been stolen?
How much was in it?
What was in it?
What kind of bag?
When did you find it was lost?
list.cn: 你什么时候发现它丢了?

list.en: Did you see the thief?
How soon can I get it back?
When can I pick it up?
How can we get in touch with you if we find it?
list.cn: 如果我们找到了，怎么跟你联系?

list.en: I'd like to report a theft.
I have lost my passport.
I love my traveling bag on the subway train.
list.cn: 我喜欢我在地铁上的旅行包。

list.en: I wonder if anyone has turned in a traveling bag.
list.cn: 我想知道是否有人交了一个旅行袋。

list.en: I was ripped off.
I've just had my wallet picked.
This is the lost and found office.
We'll call you if we find it.
list.cn: 我们找到了会给你打电话的。

list.en: It has everything in it.
I lost it on the bus.
I can't understand what you say.
Sorry I didn't catch you.
list.cn: 对不起，我没听懂你的话。

list.en: I guess the biggest problem is the language.
list.cn: 我想最大的问题是语言。

list.en: What did you say?
Please say it more slowly.
My English isn't good enough.
You can absolutely deal with it in your English level.
list.cn: 你的英语水平完全可以应付。

list.en: I can't communicate exactly what I was looking after.
list.cn: 我不知道我到底在看什么。

list.en: Does anyone speak Korean?
I can't make myself understood.
list.cn: 我无法让别人明白我的意思。

list.en: I can't get through to him.
I don't know how to say it in English.
list.cn: 我不知道用英语怎么说。

list.en: What do you call this in English?
I beg your pardon?
I want a Chinese speaking guide.
list.cn: 我想要一位会说中文的导游。

list.en: What did you say?
Would you slow down, please?
What happened to you?
Is there anyone injured on the spot?
I got stung by a bee.
He got bitten by a snake.
He passed out.
He suffered from a brain hemorrhage.
He has stopped breathing.
She suffered from a stroke.
I'm having a heart attack.
I sprained my ankle.
I was cut by something in the leg.
list.cn: 我被腿上的东西割伤了。

list.en: My car won't start.
There's no pulse.
It's bleeding.
Please call a doctor.
Help.
I want to report a fire.
I need the police.
Get me the police.
This is the emergency nine one one operator.
You have to give him mouth to mouth resuscitation.
Help, I'm trapped.
We'll send an ambulance right now.
We'll send two policemen there soon.
list.cn: 我们很快会派两名警察过去。

list.en: Sir, please help me.
I'll just phone for the doctor.
I need your help badly.
What time can you send someone over?
list.cn: 你什么时候能派人过来?

list.en: We're stuck again.
I am really Fed up with traffic jams.
list.cn: 我真的受够了交通堵塞。

list.en: It's the rush hour now.
I've been used to the traffic jam.
list.cn: 我已经习惯了交通堵塞。

list.en: Is the road ahead blocked?
There's a lot of traffic on the road.
There are traffic jams everywhere.
The traffic is very heavy now.
We can go this way to avoid a traffic jam.
list.cn: 我们可以走这条路以避免交通堵塞。

list.en: Buses are crowded in the morning.
It takes more time in rush hour.
list.cn: 高峰时间要花更多的时间。

list.en: The car hasn't moved for nearly half an hour.
list.cn: 汽车已经快半小时没动了。

list.en: The traffic is moving at a snails pace.
It's always the rush hour at this time of day.
list.cn: 每天这个时候都是交通高峰期。

list.en: We met the traffic jam.
Do you get your bearings?
There's been an accident.
The ambulance is on its way now.
There was a car accident at the intersection.
list.cn: 在十字路口发生了一起车祸。

list.en: Two trucks crashed into each other.
Where was the accident?
I braked as hard as I could.
I stopped, but only just in time.
It happens in the blink of an eye.
I merely hit by a car.
Are you feeling okay?
Will I be okay soon?
I feel sluggish.
I have loose bowels.
I have a chill.
My throat is sore.
I don't have any appetite.
I have a dull pain in my stomach.
It's because I just arrived and haven't acclimated yet.
Maybe you are just agreeing with the climate here.
list.cn: 也许你只是同意这里的气候。

list.en: You don't look well.
It might be the endemic.
Can I see your license?
I just make an illegal turn.
You're committed a parking violation.
He was fined 100 dollars.
What is the fine for speeding?
A parking ticket.
I got a parking ticket.
list.cn: 我收到一张违章停车罚单。

list.en: What did I do wrong?
May I pay the fine with my credit card?
list.cn: 我可以用信用卡支付罚款吗?

list.en: Do you have any idea of how fast you were going?
list.cn: 你知道你开得有多快吗?

list.en: What's the problem, officer?
His driving licence has been endorsed.
list.cn: 他的驾驶执照上有批注。

list.en: I gotta take it for speeding.
You were exceeding the speed limit.
What's the cause of the delay?
Is the flight departing on time?
Will the flight leave today?
How long will the flight be delayed?
My flight was delayed for two days.
I hurried to the airport only to be told the plane had been put off.
list.cn: 我匆匆赶到机场，却被告知飞机已经晚点了。

list.en: The storm held up our flight for one hour.
list.cn: 暴风雨使我们的航班延误了一个小时。

list.en: The flight was put off due to the storm.
list.cn: 由于暴风雨，航班被推迟了。

list.en: Boarding is delayed.
The flight has to be delayed for about three hours.
list.cn: 这班飞机要延误大约三个小时。

list.en: What time can we get on the plane?
list.cn: 我们什么时候能上飞机?

list.en: Please check a monitor for departure time.
list.cn: 请在显示器上查看出发时间。
